summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorney Alison Moe and defense attorney Christian Everdell regarding a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel. The correspondence involves scheduling a call to discuss the letter, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Prosecutor in the Southern District of New York who is being contacted to discuss a letter from Maxwell's defense counsel.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP who sent the initial email with an attached letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the attached letter from her defense counsel that is being discussed between prosecutors and defense attorneys.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Lara
persons.context: Copied on the initial email from Christian Everdell along with Alison Moe regarding the letter about Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Email Exchange Regarding Maxwell Letter
events.description: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe and defense attorney Christian Everdell about scheduling a call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's counsel.

events.title: Defense Letter Submission
events.description: Christian Everdell sends an email with an attached letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell to prosecutors and other defense team members.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
800 Third Avenue, New York, NY (Cohen & Gresser LLP office)
keyFacts: The document shows ongoing legal communication between prosecutors and defense attorneys in the Ghislaine Maxwell case in September 2020.
Christian Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP is acting as defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The defense team includes multiple attorneys: Mark S. Cohen, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe is the prosecutor handling communications with the defense team.
The correspondence centers on scheduling a call to discuss a letter from Maxwell's defense counsel, indicating active case management.
